ygData.subject: twisting 5
ygData.msgSnippet: OK, Sitting around with some RL friends who play everquest, and suddenly one of them says by the way, your bard sucks now.  Eh? I say.  Yeah, we played
ygData.messageBody:
OK,

Sitting around with some RL friends who play everquest, and suddenly one of
them says "by the way, your bard sucks now." "Eh?" I say. "Yeah, we
played with a bard the other night, 58, who kept 4 songs going most of the
fight and said when things get tough he twists in a fifth."

Is this BS? Or do i really suck. When I have a good connection and low
lag I keep four going with few drops...

I have one song per hotkey, and I hit 1122334411223344...

Am I missing something here? Should I set up hotkeys so that one casts two
songs with appropriate delays? I've never like that idea because it gives
me less flexibility... but now I begin to wonder.

Or is this bs...

Very curious to hear what y'all have to say

Raub Zaumbie
38 :-) E. Marr
